Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.controller

Class CustomersUpdateSceneController

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.controller.CustomersUpdateSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomersUpdateSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class for the Customers Update Scene
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CustomersUpdateSceneController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cancel()
    This method calls to clear all inputs and changes the application main Stage Scene to the Customers Main Scene
    void cancelCustMod​(java.lang.String message)
    This method calls to clear all inputs, set a flag that there is a message to display on the Customers Main Scene, and set the message to display
    void clear()
    Clears all input controls and the stored selectedCustomer value
    java.lang.Boolean createCustomer()
    This method directs the process of creating a new Customer entry in the UCertify database data source.
    void deleteCustomer()
    This method directs the deletion of a Customer entry from the UCertify database data source.
    void filterCustomerChoices()
    Filters the list of all Customers based on the user inputted value in the customerNameSearchField
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
    Initializes the controller class.
    void populateSelectedCountryDivisions​(java.lang.String countryName)
    Populates the First-Level Division data in the divisionComboBox with Division names for the user selected country
    void selectThisCountry()
    Calls the method to populate Division names when the user selects a Country name
    void selectThisCustomer()
    Populates the Customer Name Field with the user selected name as well as sets the selectedCustomer object property values to that of the user selected Customer entry
    java.lang.Boolean updateCustomer()
    This method directs the process of updating a Customer entry in the UCertify database data source.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • filterCustomerChoices

      public void filterCustomerChoices()
      Filters the list of all Customers based on the user inputted value in the customerNameSearchField

    • selectThisCustomer

      public void selectThisCustomer()
      Populates the Customer Name Field with the user selected name as well as sets the selectedCustomer object property values to that of the user selected Customer entry

    • selectThisCountry

      public void selectThisCountry()
      Calls the method to populate Division names when the user selects a Country name

    • populateSelectedCountryDivisions

      public void populateSelectedCountryDivisions​(java.lang.String countryName)
      Populates the First-Level Division data in the divisionComboBox with Division names for the user selected country
      Parameters:
      countryName - the countryName to use for Division data searching

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all input controls and the stored selectedCustomer value

    • createCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean createCustomer() throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      This method directs the process of creating a new Customer entry in the UCertify database data source. This method ensures validation of the user inputs, communicates with the data source with a DAO, and updates the UI display message accordingly
      Returns:
      true if the insertion successfully completes, false if the insertion does not successfully complete
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is an FXML loading error
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a data access error

    • updateCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean updateCustomer() throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      This method directs the process of updating a Customer entry in the UCertify database data source. This method ensures validation of the user input, interacts with the Customer data through a DAO, and sets UI messages accordingly
      Returns:
      true if the update successfully completes, false if the update does not successfully complete
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is an FXML loading error
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer() throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      This method directs the deletion of a Customer entry from the UCertify database data source.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is an FXML loading error
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • cancel

      public void cancel() throws java.io.IOException
      This method calls to clear all inputs and changes the application main Stage Scene to the Customers Main Scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is an FXML loading error

    • cancelCustMod

      public void cancelCustMod​(java.lang.String message) throws java.io.IOException, java.sql.SQLException
      This method calls to clear all inputs, set a flag that there is a message to display on the Customers Main Scene, and set the message to display
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display on the Customer Main Scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is an FXML loading error
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error
